price: ¿Acaso no sabe que cuando se haga surgir a quienes están en las sepulturas
arabic: ۞ أَفَلَا يَعۡلَمُ إِذَا بُعۡثِرَ مَا فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: afalā yaʿlamu idhā buʿ'thira mā fī al-qubūri
